item.description: * { background: transparent; font-family: Yantramanav, serif; color: #ffffff; font-size: 16px; } input, textarea{ width: 100%; padding: 10px 20px 10px 10px; margin: 3px 0 20px; display: inline-block; border: 1px solid #b3b2b2; border-radius: 4px; box-sizing: border-box; background: transparent; transition:.5s ease; color: #b3b2b2; } input:hover, textarea:hover{ border: 1px solid #ffffff; color: #ffffff; } input:focus, textarea:focus{ border: 1px solid #ffffff; outline-width: 0; color: #ffffff; } textarea.large{ height: 250px; resize: none; } button { color: #ffffff; width: 100%; background: transparent; border: 1px solid #b3b2b2; transition:.
